Privacy policy for cryptobrador.com

On cryptobrador.com, which is available at cryptobrador.com, is one of our top priorities order confidentiality visitor. This privacy policy document contains the type of information that is collected and registered cryptobrador.com and how we use it.

If you have more questions or need more information about our guidelines privacy, please contact us.

This privacy policy only applies to our online activities and applies to visitors to our website with in relation to information that is shared and/or collected on cryptobrador.com. This policy is not applies to all data collected offline or via channels other than this website.

Consent

By using our website, you accept and agree to be bound by our privacy policy with its terms.

Data we collect

The personal information you must provide and the reasons why you must provide it to make sure of we will explain to you when we ask you to provide personal data.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you, such as your name Your e-mail address address, telephone number, the content of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and everything else another information you can provide.

When you register for an account, we may ask for your contact information, including elements such as name, company name, address, e-mail address and telephone number.

How we use your data

We use the information we collect in a number of ways, including:

  • Delivery, operation and maintenance of our website
  • Improve, customize and expand our website
  • Understand and analyze how you use our website
  • Development of new products, services, functions and features
  • We communicate with you directly or through one of our partners, including customer service to provide you with updates and other information relating to the Website and for marketing and promotional purposes purpose
  • Sending you an email
  • Detect and prevent fraud

Log files

cryptobrador.com follows the standard procedure for using log files. These files record visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and part of the service analysis hosting. Information collected with log files include Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, provider Internet services (ISP), date and time, referring/exit pages and, if applicable, the number of clicks. They are not affiliated any personal information. The purpose of the information is to analyze trends, administer the website, track users' movements on the website and collect information demographic.

Privacy policy for advertising partners

In this list you can see the privacy policy for each of the partners advertising you have cryptobrador.com.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks use technologies such as cookies, JavaScript or web beacons that are is used in relevant advertisements and links displayed on cryptobrador.com which are submitted direct the user's browser. When this happens, they automatically get your IP address. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or customize content ADVERTISING as you see on the websites you visit.

Please note that cryptobrador.com does not have access to or control over the cookies it uses third parties advertisers.

Privacy policy for third parties

The privacy policy of commmmms does not apply to other advertisers or websites web. That's what we recommend you should review the respective privacy policies of these third-party ad servers for more information Information. It may include their practices and instructions on how to opt out of certain options.

You can disable cookies through individual browser options. To learn more in detail information on handling cookies with specific browsers, you can find this in your browser or websites.

CCPA Privacy Rights (Don't Sell My Personal Information)

Under the CCPA, California consumers have, among other rights, the right to:

Require a company that collects personal information from consumers to disclose the categories and SPECIFICALLY personal data collected by the company about consumers.

Ask the company to delete any personal consumer information it has collected company.

Ask a company that sells personal information about consumers not to sell your personal information consumer.

If you send a request, we have one month to respond. If you want to perform any of those these rights, please contact us.

GDPR data protection rights

We would like to ensure that you are fully aware of all your data protection rights. Each user is which is entitled to the following:

Right to access - you have the right to request copies of your personal data. We can charge you small fee fee for this service.

Right to rectification - You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe to be incorrect they are inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we fill in the information you want uncomplete.

Right to deletion - in some cases you have the right to request that we delete your personal data relationship relationship.

Right to restriction of processing – you have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your data personal data, under certain conditions.

Right to object to processing - you have the right to object to our processing of your data your personal under certain conditions.

The right to data portability - you have the right to request the transfer of the data we hold collected to another organization or directly to you under certain conditions.

If you send a request, we have one month to respond. If you want to perform any of those these rights, please contact us.

Important Risk Notice:

  • Engaging in trading can yield significant benefits; however, it also carries a risk of partial/full funds loss, which should be acknowledged by prospective investors. Approximately 70 percent of investors will incur financial losses.

  • #Cryptobrador and any other trade names utilized on this site are strictly for commercial purposes, and do not pertain to any specific company nor specific service providers.

  • The provided video is solely for commercial demonstration and illustrative purposes, with all participants acting in a staged manner.

  • Carefully review the Terms & Conditions and the Disclaimer page of the third-party investor platform before making any investment. Users should be aware of their individual capital gain tax liability in their country of residence. Soliciting United States persons to buy and sell commodity options, even if they are termed ‘prediction' contracts, is prohibited unless they are registered for trading and are traded on a CFTC-registered exchange or unless legally exempt.

  • The Financial Conduct Authority ('FCA') has released a policy statement PS20/10, which bans the sale, promotion, and distribution of CFDs on Crypto assets. The dissemination of marketing materials related to the distribution of CFDs and other financial products based on Cryptocurrencies aimed at UK residents is prohibited.

  • By submitting your personal details herein, you consent and authorize us to share your personal information with third parties providing trading services as delineated in the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.

  • Various trading options are available to the trader/user – through trading software, employing human brokers, or executing own trades, and it's solely the trader’s responsibility to choose and decide the suitable method of trading for him/her.
